applet_name: Automatically add new tasks with a specific label to Evernote
applet_description: This Applet will sync any tasks with a specific label (you could use Evernote) to a new note in the Evernote notebook of your choice. Sync it up, and get it done!

applet_name: Save liked tweets as tasks in Todoist
applet_description: No time to read all the links and twitter threads in your timeline? Just like the tweet, and the tweet details and first link will be posted as a task on the Todoist project of your choice.

applet_name: Add saved items from Pocket to Todoist
applet_description: When you save a new item to Pocket, this will be added as a task in your Todoist account.

applet_name: Sync Evernote and Todoist
applet_description: Two way syncing of Evernote notes and Todoist tasks

applet_name: Save new iOS reminders as a Todoist task
applet_description: Creates a new Todoist task when you create an iOS reminder. Thus you can finally create Todoist tasks with Siri.

applet_name: Automatically add new tasks from Google Tasks to Todoist
applet_description: This Applet will create a task in Todoist any time a task is added to Google Tasks

applet_name: Automatically create Google Calendar events for new Todoist tasks
applet_description: Stay organized and efficient: Automatically add a new event to your calendar when you add a new task to Todoist.

applet_name: Put all your completed tasks in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Document your accomplishments and completed tasks one-by-one in a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Add a task to Todoist Inbox for every note tagged with "Todoist" in Evernote
applet_description: Create a task in your Todoist Inbox if you add "Todoist" tag to any notes in Evernote. It uses the Todoist formatting syntax to create a hyperlink in the task title to the note, using note's title and PublicUrl of the note.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: If any new Google Calendar event, create Todoist task
applet_description: Any time you create a new event in Google Calendar, a new Todoist task is created, as well.

applet_name: Use Siri to create Todoist reminders
applet_description: New tasks added to your default list in iOS Reminders are also added to your "Today" list and inbox in Todoist

applet_name: Transfer Calendar Events to Todoist
applet_description: Sometimes you subscribe to a calendar service with assigned tasks/events by some organizations, but sadly you cannot set up alert for them. This applet helps you to add these tasks to your Todoist so you will not miss them.
applet_Trigger: New event added to specific calendar

applet_name: Make a new task
applet_description: Quickly add a new task on Todoist with this simple Applet.

applet_name: Todoist "Completed Tasks" saved to Day One
applet_description: Save your completed tasks from Todoist as a new Journal Entry in Day On.

applet_name: Echo add shopping list item to grocery list in todoist.
applet_description: Add shopping list item as a task under any project in Todoist (e.g. create a project called "Grocery List", and select that project as the action in the recipe).
applet_Trigger: Item added to your Shopping List

applet_name: Log completed Todoist Tasks to one Evernote note
applet_description: Keep track of your completed Todoist tasks in an appended Evernote note.

applet_name: Trello tasks assigned to me go into Todoist
applet_description: You can add your tasks from Trello to Todoist easily.

applet_name: Todoist Tickler
applet_description: Adding an event to your Google calendar will get inserted into Todoist at the time the event starts. This is extremely helpful for tasks that need attention weeks or months away :)

applet_name: If you miss a call on your Android phone, have Todoist remind you to return it
applet_description:
If you miss a call on your Android phone, create a Todoist task to remind me to call back.

(Note: This recipe requires the IFTTT app to be installed on the Android device.)

applet_name: Automatically add new Todoist tasks with a specific label to Google Tasks
applet_description:
This Applet will sync any tasks with a specific
label (you could use Google Tasks) to a Google Tasks tasklist.

applet_name: Add assigned Github issues to your Todoist
applet_description: Make sure you keep on top of the GitHub issues that have been raised to you by easily seeing them at a glance in Todoist.

applet_name: NEXT ACTION HABITS
applet_description: When you complete the task, it will create a NEXT ACTION TASK to fill in

applet_name: Create a new task in Todoist by messaging @IFTTT in Telegram
applet_description: Send a message to @IFTTT starting with 'Create task' to create a new task in Todoist. E.g. 'Create task Call grandma to wish her a happy birthday'
applet_Trigger: New message with key phrase to @IFTTT

applet_name: New OneNote Page for specific ToDoIstask #TodoistIFTTT
applet_description: Create a Task with the Label OneNote then a new OneNote page will be created where you can collect every important information

applet_name: Get a summary email of tasks you have completed this week
applet_description: Need to keep tabs on your weekly accomplishments? This is a perfect Applet for you. See all your completed tasks in one single email.

applet_name: Todoist calendar creator
applet_description: Creates a calendar event for todoist items
applet_Action: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

applet_name: Create ClickUp tasks from new tasks in Todoist
applet_description: No need to waste time copying tasks between apps. Use this Applet to automatically have your Todoist tasks added to ClickUp.

applet_name: Create calendar event for tasks with label @calendar
applet_description: This applet creates​ an event on google calendar for tasks that have a specific label.

applet_name: A checklist of completed Todoist tasks in Evernote
applet_description: Each completed Todoist task is appended to an Evernote note with a checklist

applet_name: Create a Todoist task when a card is added to a list
applet_description: Just pick the board and the list, and when a card is added in Trello, a corresponding task will be created in Todoist automatically. Get. More. Done!

applet_name: New Task for Todoist
applet_description: Creates a new task for todoist

applet_name: Memorialize Todoist Tasks in OneNote
applet_description: Keep track of what you do in OneNote

applet_name: Fiverr todos
applet_description: Creates a todo when you get fiverr orders.

applet_name: Track completed Todoist tasks on your Welltory dashboard
applet_description: Find correlations between your lifestyle and productivity

applet_name: Task in #todoist >> Post to #slack
applet_description: Create a new task in #todoist and publis that task into a #slack channel.

applet_name: Track the completed items on your to-do list
applet_description: Whenever you mark an item as completed in Todoist, a highlight event will be logged so you can have a record of how many items you complete each day.

applet_name: Track new Todoist tasks on your Welltory dashboard
applet_description: Keep track of all your new tasks

applet_name: Automatically create a Trello card when you make a new task
applet_description: Sync your to-dos with your Trello — when you add a task, it'll make a new card with the details on the board and list you specify.

applet_name: Todoist task to Google Sheets
applet_description: Add Todoist task with specific label to Google Sheets

applet_name: Send iOS screenshot as Todoist task
applet_description: I put everything in the Inbox.

applet_name: If a new to-do list item is created in Todoist via Alexa, import that task to a Ticktick list
applet_description:
This is a convoluted workaround for the currently nonfunctional Ticktick Alexa skill. It requires a Todoist account (free is okay) linked to Alexa via the Todoist Alexa skill. Once you link those and have the required Alexa lists ready to go in your Todoist account, just ask Alexa to add something to your to-do list, and she'll send that to the Alexa To-do List in Todoist, then this will send the same task to your Ticktick inbox! 

Dear Ticktick, please fix the Alexa skill!

applet_name: Log Todoist completed tasks in Onenote
applet_description: This Logs todoist completed tasks into a new Onenote page.

applet_name: Add your Pocket reading list to Todoist
applet_description: Whenever you tag an article on Pocket, a new Todoist task will be created. You'll always be on top of your reading list!

applet_name: Create Todoist tasks for new issues in Jira
applet_description: Stay on top of your work by putting new Jira issues into a to-do list. This Applet will automatically create Todoist tasks for newly created Jira issues.

applet_name: SMS saying "remember to.." adds Todoist task
applet_description: Whenever somebody sends you a text message reminding you of something you are supposed to remember to do, when using the phrase "remember to..", a Todoist task will be created from their message.

applet_name: Add new Pipedrive activities to Todoist as tasks
applet_description: Don't waste time manually creating tasks for your deals and activities. Use this Applet to automatically create new tasks in Todoist for new activities added to your Pipedrive deals.

applet_name: Create Task to Reply to Fiverr Messages in Todoist
applet_description: Helps manage #Fiverr conversations easily by creating tasks in #Todoist

applet_name: Track phone call answered, then create a task in Inbox
applet_description: Track phone call answered, then create a task in Inbox
